description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Noodle Salad With Peanut Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken Noodle Salad With Peanut Dressing
name: Chicken Noodle Salad With Peanut Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk peanut butter, vinegar, lime juice, oil, soy sauce, sugar, chilli flakes and 2 tbs water in a jug, adding a little more water if dressing is too thick. Pour dressing over noodle salad and toss to combine. To serve, scatter with peanuts and remaining coriander.
